channel.title: The Michelle Obama Podcast
channel.description: The Michelle Obama Podcast features the former First Lady diving deep into conversations with loved ones—family, friends, and colleagues—on the relationships in our lives that make us who we are.

item.title: Introducing "Renegades: Born in the USA"
item.description: So much has happened since the debut of The Michelle Obama Podcast—including President Barack Obama, launching a podcast of his own. Renegades: Born in the USA is a series of conversations between the former Commander in Chief and Bruce Springsteen about their lives, their favorite music, and their enduring love of America, despite all its challenges and contradictions. This episode—about fatherhood—is Mrs. Obama’s favorite. But they’re all terrific. Head to the Renegades: Born in the USA feed here to listen to all eight now.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Family Ties: On Raising Kids with Craig & Marian Robinson
item.description: Michelle’s mom and brother join to talk all things parenting—from bringing babies home to dropping them off at college. Find the episode transcript here: https://spoti.fi/TMOP_transcripts  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Across Generations: Michelle Obama and Her Mentees
item.description: Part two of our discussion about mentorship features Michelle in conversation with her younger team members, in which they explore the ups and downs of professional life and what it’s like to be a black woman right now. Find the episode transcript here: https://spoti.fi/TMOP_transcripts  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Working Women: Valerie Jarrett and the Importance of Mentorship
item.description: In part one of her discussion about mentorship, Michelle reminisces with her friend and former boss Valerie Jarrett about personal growth in the workplace. Find the episode transcript here: https://spoti.fi/TMOP_transcripts  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: They Do: Talking Marriage with Conan O’Brien
item.description: Conan O’Brien video chats with Michelle to discuss the challenges and joys of marriage. Find the episode transcript here: http://spoti.fi/TMOP_transcripts Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Gift of Girlfriends with Denielle, Sharon, and Kelly
item.description: Michelle Obama sits down with three of her dearest friends—Denielle Pemberton-Heard, Dr. Sharon Malone, and Kelly Dibble—to talk about women’s friendship and navigating the White House years. Find the episode transcript here: http://spoti.fi/TMOP_transcripts   Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Growing Up Robinson with Craig and Michelle
item.description: Michelle chats with her beloved older brother about their childhood and growing up together on the South Side of Chicago. Find the episode transcript here: http://spoti.fi/TMOP_transcripts   Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: What Your Mother Never Told You About Health with Dr. Sharon Malone
item.description: Michelle talks with her friend, Dr. Sharon Malone, an OB-GYN, about women’s health, menopause, and aging. Find the episode transcript here: http://spoti.fi/TMOP_transcripts  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Protests and the Pandemic with Michele Norris
item.description: Award-winning journalist Michele Norris joins Michelle to discuss how we can gain new understandings of ourselves during an international pandemic and national reckoning with race. Find the episode transcript here: http://spoti.fi/TMOP_transcripts   Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: President Barack Obama
item.description: Michelle talks with her husband about the current moment and our responsibilities to our communities, our country, and each other. Find the episode transcript here: http://spoti.fi/TMOP_transcripts  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Hi, I’m Michelle Obama
item.description: “I finally had some time to breathe.” In this warm preview of The Michelle Obama Podcast, the former First Lady reflects on life after the White House, finding her truth, and the relationships that have shaped her. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Michelle Obama Podcast Trailer
item.description: Get ready to go deep, because the former First Lady is about to launch her new show, The Michelle Obama Podcast. Listen to a sneak preview now. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Introducing The Michelle Obama Podcast
item.description: In this welcome message, the former First Lady introduces her latest post-White House project, The Michelle Obama Podcast. The series features deep dives with loved ones—family, friends, and colleagues—on the relationships in our lives that make us who we are. The Michelle Obama Podcast debuts on July 29th. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
